question: Which sportsperson has clinched the ITTF Women's World Cup title?
explanation:
World number one Table tennis player Chen Meng clinched the ITTF Women's World Cup title of this year.
The 26-year old player beat Chinese compatriot Sun Yingsha to win her maiden ITTF Women's World Cup title in Weihai. She also became the first winner of the ITTF's #RESTART series.
